import React from 'react' function DateItem(props) { function handleClick(e){ //Change page to crew maker props.pageupdate("crew-maker") } console.log(props.colour) var colorCode = "#fcba03" if(props.colour === "blue")colorCode = "#483bff" else if(props.colour === "red")colorCode = "#e22113" else if(props.colour === "green")colorCode = "#46dd0b" else if(props.colour === "yellow")colorCode = "#ffeb3b" return(

Tuesday, 25th September

{props.name}

{props.location}

) } export default DateItem
